DOC.brief_title: Conjugated Linoleic Acid ( 1:1 Isomer Mixture ) Intake Overweight People
DOC.criteria: age 3055 year grade II overweight ( BMI≥27 < 30 kg/m2 ) adhere calorie restriction diet take weight control medication lose 5 kg three month prior study suffer serious concomitant disease diabetes mellitus type II , metabolic syndrome ( accord criterion Adult Treatment Panel III ) , cancer , kidney disease , HIV , tuberculosis , cardiovascular disease , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , eat disorder . undergone bariatric surgery and/or intestinal resection breastfeed pregnancy . give sign , informed consent include study .
